metadata.name: Potential Discovery Activity Using Find - MacOS
metadata.comment: Detects usage of "find" binary in a suspicious manner to perform discovery

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/find')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-perm -4000')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-perm -2000')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-perm 0777')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-perm -222')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-perm -o w')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-perm -o x')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-perm -u=s')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-perm -g=s'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of "find" binary in a suspicious manner to perform discovery
